div.p:
The teaser text entered here overwrites the regular article text and is shown in various teaser views.
If you choose not to enter anything here, the start of the regular article text is used instead.
Heading 1: Introduction
Please enter your article body text into this form field. First use Ctrl-A to select all sample text and then type your own.
You can also paste formatted text from Microsoft Word by using the "Paste from Word" button in the toolbar just above. As you enter text, the preview to the right will refresh automatically.
Heading 2: Styling text

By default any text will be rendered as a two-column view on any device with appropriate screen width (such as Tablets and Desktops - Smartphones always get a one-column view), unless you choose the Layout Type "Single Column" below. The article text can be formatted with various styles, such as bold, italics, both bold and italics, underline, strike-through, superscript or subscript or any combination thereof.

blockquote.p: Simon says: This is a block quote which can also contain formatted text in bold, italics, both bold and italics, underline, strike-through, superscript or subscript or any combination thereof.

div.p: Heading 2: Adding Images

Open the Library and drag existing pictures into the "Pictures" list below. These will show up as the Header image in your article. If you add more than one image, all images will cycle as a slide-show.
To upload a new image, press the "Create New Content Item" button in the Pictures area below.
Heading 3: Adding Related Content Sidebar
If you want to add related content or products to this article, either put them directly into the "Related Content Items" field below, such as "Sample 4 Picture" and "Sample 5 Picture".

Or put them into the "New Article Related Collection" which can be re-used then in other articles by linking it into them. Open this collection by double clicking it below - it will show in a new Studio tab and you can modify the order of the items by dragging them in the list.
Heading 3: Sub-chapter
